heading: HB09192
0: AN ACT DECLARING PAG-ASA ISLAND AND ITS ADJOINING ISLANDS OF PAROLA, KOTA AND PANATA IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF KALAYAAN, PROVINCE OF PALAWAN AS ECOTOURISM DESTINATIONS AND PROTECTED AREAS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
